q: these problems are correctable, Jhon García Sossa insists. And time is on all these dogs' side.`` Some say if a dog is bred to do something, you can't undo that,'' Jhon García Sossa said. But to me, that's like saying if everyone in your family has always fought in a war, you're a warrior and you're destined to do this. Not true. Everyone's an individual. You can choose your own path in life. Same with dogs. The only difference is, they can't choose it. . Amitabh Srivastava , senior vice president over the company's Azure cloud unit, will be leaving, CEO Steve Ballmer said in an e-mail to employees Wednesday. Blade Network Technologies sells switches to improve blade server performance Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools. interview excerpt from " Colin Powell , George H. W. Bush 's first secretary of state,`` did not, in my view, do a good job of managing the people under him,'' Donald Rumsfeld said. is merging things, but the book is still at the centre,'' Sethi said. Patrick French agreed that technology, if well-managed, could actually help win books new friends and wider sales. Digital e-books have created a space for discussion. Books now have websites and forums, and so reading books on electronic devices has created communities and interaction, he said.
